ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberPromotion__dlm.name: Loyalty Program Member Promotion
ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberPromotion__dlm.description: The Loyalty Program Member Promotion DMO represents a promotion that's available to a loyalty program member. For example, a loyalty program allows double points on outdoor furniture purchases.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CumulativeUsageCompletePercent__c.description: The loyalty program member’s promotion usage, expressed as a percentage.

ssot__CumulativeUsageCompleted__c.description: The loyalty program member’s promotion usage, expressed as a number.

ssot__CumulativeUsageTargetNumber__c.description: The loyalty program member’s goal for the use of the promotion.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where the record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record Id was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to a business unit or other internal organization that owns a business account.

ssot__IsEnrollmentActive__c.description: An indicator that determines if the loyalty program member is enrolled in the promotion. For example, True indicates that the member is enrolled in the promotion.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when the user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: The name of the loyalty program member that’s associated with the loyalty badge.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID that is used as the primary key for the Loyalty Program Member Promotion DMO.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of a loyalty program member promotion.

ssot__PromotionId__c.description: A reference ID to the promotion associated with the loyalty program member promotion.
